title: Numbers 1-20
instructions: Write the numbers using letters. You need to be as quick and as correct as you can. Your timer shows the average time you spend typing the correct answers. title: Prepositions of movement
instructions: Write the missing words. You need to be as quick and as correct as you can. Your timer shows the average time you spend typing the correct answers. It starts as soon as you click the "Start" button and you're not allowed to move on to the next question until you've typed the answer with the correct spelling. There is no "Submit" button: after giving a correct answer you are immediately taken to the next question and your timer starts ticking again. See how many people you can beat in your group.

cards.question: I wanted to swim _____ the river but I gave up after 10 minutes.
We need to drive _____ this lake to get to the swimming pool.
Walk _____ the road until you find a bridge.
They came running _____ the stairs.
She went _____ when she heard the bell ringing.
Did you walk here _____ home?
We jumped _____ the water immediately.
He went _____ the room to make a phone call.
Minnie jumped _____ the wall but Mickey didn't.
Will you be going _____ my house on your way home?
You just went _____ the traffic lights. And they were red!
I didn't go _____ school yesterday.
What do you call a boat that can travel _____ water? – A submarine.
You never pick your socks _____ off the floor.
She was in the kitchen but she went _____ to see what was happening in her neighbour's garden.
Please put your money _____, I’m paying.
It got darker and darker as they drove _____ the city.
The President stepped down from the stairs _____ the red carpet.
I fell _____ a cherry tree once when I was a kid.

title: Hypothetical meaning
instructions: Write the missing words. You need to be as quick and as correct as you can. Your timer shows the average time you spend typing the correct answers. It starts as soon as you click the "Start" button and you're not allowed to move on to the next question until you've typed the answer with the correct spelling. There is no "Submit" button: after giving a correct answer you are immediately taken to the next question and your timer starts ticking again. See how many people you can beat in your group.

cards.question: I wish it _____ (not be) so difficult to write an original piece of music these days.
I wish I _____ (can) remember where I put the car keys.
I can't afford to travel. If only I _____ (have) a better-paid job!
If only I _____ (have) more time to do nothing!
I'm beginning to wish we _____ (not buy) that indoor exercise bike. It's just collecting dust.
I wish I _____ (start) learning to drive when I was 16.
If only you _____ (tell) me about the changes earlier!
If only I _____ (bring) my phone charger!
I wish you _____ (stop) arguing with me. Now!
If only it _____ (stop) raining! I want to go out and meet my buddies.
I'd rather you _____ (go) to get some butter for the cake now.
Do you mind if I smoke? – Well, I'd rather you _____ (not do) actually.
I'd rather you _____ (not tell) them. It has caused a lot of confusion.
This car is falling apart. I'd rather we _____ (never buy) it.
It's about time you _____ (buy) a new phone.
It's time you _____ (go) to bed. You've got school tomorrow.
It's high time you _____ (stop) talking and get down to some work.
The floods were rising and it seemed as if it _____ (be) the end of the world.
From this angle, the island looks as though it _____ (be) a sleeping giant lying on his back.
